code: import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[inpVal,setInpVal]=useState({user:'',pass:''});const handleChange=(identifier,value)=>{setInpVal(prevVal=>({...prevVal,[identifier]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Username:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:inpVal.user,onChange:e=>handleChange('user',e.target.value),placeholder:"Username"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Password:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:inpVal.pass,onChange:e=>handleChange('pass',e.target.value),placeholder:"Password"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Login"})]})]});};export default Login;
